Title: What was the most recent invoice for red rock diner?
QueryBody: select transaction_id from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and customers = "red rock diner" order by transaction_date desc limit 1

Title: How much did freeman sporting good spend on meal and entertainment in July?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where T1.customers = "freeman sporting good" and instr(account,"meal and entertainment") and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = 7 and account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense')

Title: This quarter to date, what was our largest expense?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)  order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: give me the list of accounts where my revenue increased by more than 50% in this month as compared to last month
QueryBody: select T1.account, revenue_this_month, revenue_last_month from(select account, sum(credit) as revenue_this_month from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_timestamp) group by account) as T1 join (select account, sum(credit) as revenue_last_month from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_timestamp) - 1 group by account) as T2 where revenue_this_month >= revenue_last_month * 1.5

Title: How many invoices have we sent to customer dylan sollfrank?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "dylan sollfrank" and transaction_type = 'invoice'

Title: How much we received from permits in Last 12 months?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income', 'Other Income') and instr(account,"permits") and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "-12 months", "start of month") AND date( current_date)

Title: What was our greatest expense This year to date?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, 'start of year') AND date(current_date) order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: How many invoices have we sent to customer wedding planning by whitney?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "wedding planning by whitney" and transaction_type = 'invoice'

Title: When was the last time we billed for hours
QueryBody: select transaction_date from master_txn_table where product_service = "hours" order by transaction_date desc limit 1;

Title: What was our biggest expense Last 12 months?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "-12 months", "start of month") AND date( current_date)  order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: How much has Salesperson X collected in "Bond Fees" yesterday?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where account in ('Income','Other Income') and transaction_date = date(current_date, "-1 days") and misc.salesperson = X and product_service = 'Bond fees'

Title: Display all transactions involving sonnenschein family store
QueryBody: select distinct transaction_id from master_txn_table where customers = "sonnenschein family store"

Title: When did customer gevelber photography last pay?
QueryBody: select distinct transaction_id, amount, transaction_date from master_txn_table where customers = "gevelber photography" and transaction_type = 'payment' order by transaction_date desc limit 1

Title: How much did we spend on squeaky kleen car wash in august?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where vendor = "squeaky kleen car wash" and account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: Show number of transactions with Mr B
QueryBody: select transaction_type, count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = 'B' or vendor = 'B'

Title: Number of invoices created for unapplied cash payment income in This quarter to date?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and instr(account,"unapplied cash payment income") and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: Who are my outstanding debtors?
QueryBody: select customer_name, balance from customers where balance != 0

Title: Display the total number of transactions with kookies by kathy
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "kookies by kathy"

Title: What is mark cho credit for on <date>?
QueryBody: select sum(open_balance) from (select distinct transaction_id, open_balance from master_txn_table where customers = "mark cho" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)  and account = 'account receivable')

Title: What our monthly spend on pam seitz
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table where vendor = "pam seitz" group by strftime("%m", transaction_date);

Title: What was our smallest expense Last fiscal year?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year','-1 years', '+3 months') AND date(current_date, '-3 months', 'start of year','-1 years', '+3 months', '+1 years', '-1 days'); order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: How much has Salesperson X collected in "Bond Fees" yesterday?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where account in ('Income','Other Income') and transaction_date = date(current_date, "-1 days") and misc.salesperson = X and product_service = 'Bond fees'

Title: How much money did we make Last 30 days?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "-30 days") AND date( current_date)

Title: Last month, what was our largest expense?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "start of month", "-1 months") AND date( current_date, "start of month", "-1 days")  order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: How many checks did we issue yesterday?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'check' and transaction_date= date(current_date, "-1 days")

Title: How much credit does kate whelan have since <date>?
QueryBody: select sum(open_balance) from (select distinct transaction_id, open_balance from master_txn_table where customers = "kate whelan" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)  and account = 'account receivable')

Title: Show all transactions with diego rodriguez
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "diego rodriguez"

Title: Have we billed shara barnett for the trimming last month?
QueryBody: select transaction_id from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'bill' and customers = "shara barnett" and product_service = "trimming"

Title: How many hours did sushi by katsuyuki sell This year?
QueryBody: select sum(quantity) from master_txn_table where customers = "sushi by katsuyuki" and product_service = "hours" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, 'start of year') AND date(current_date)

Title: Show number of transactions with 55 twin lane
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "55 twin lane"

Title: Have we billed diego rodriguez for the maintenance last month?
QueryBody: select transaction_id from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'bill' and customers = "diego rodriguez" and product_service = "maintenance"

Title: give me the list of accounts where my revenue increased by more than 50% in this month as compared to last month
QueryBody: select T1.account, revenue_this_month, revenue_last_month from(select account, sum(credit) as revenue_this_month from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_timestamp) group by account) as T1 join (select account, sum(credit) as revenue_last_month from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_timestamp) - 1 group by account) as T2 where revenue_this_month >= revenue_last_month * 1.5

Title: What is the balance owed by gevelber photography?
QueryBody: select balance from Customers where customer_name = "gevelber photography"

Title: What was the highest invoice amount for shara barnett?
QueryBody: select T1.customers, revenue_this_month, revenue_last_month from (select customers, sum(credit) as revenue_this_month from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where T2.account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and strftime("%m", T1.transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_timestamp) group by customers) as T1 join (select customers, sum(credit) as revenue_last_month from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Income','Other Income') and strftime("%m", transaction_date) = strftime("%m", current_timestamp) - 1 group by customers) as T2 on T1.customers = T2.customers where revenue_this_month < revenue_last_month

Title: What was our biggest expense This quarter?
QueryBody: select account, sum(debit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense','Other Expense') and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)  order by sum(debit) desc limit 1

Title: When did geeta kalapatapu first pay?
QueryBody: select transaction_date from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'payment' and customers = "geeta kalapatapu" order by transaction_date limit 1

Title: This week, what are my account payable?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where account = 'account payable' and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "weekday 0", "-7 days") AND date( current_date)

Title: What are my min sales by vendor?
QueryBody: select vendor, min(credit) from master_txn_table group by vendor

Title: How often do we bill repair for cool cars?
QueryBody: select sum(quantity) from master_txn_table where customers = "cool cars" and product_service = "repair"

Title: What was our total income from sprinkler heads in q2
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table where product_service = "sprinkler heads" and strftime("%m", transaction_date) in ("04", "05", "06");

Title: How much has amy's bird sanctuary paid us This year to date?
QueryBody: select sum(credit) from master_txn_table  as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where customers = "amy's bird sanctuary" and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date, 'start of year') AND date(current_date) and account_type in ('Income','Other Income')

Title: What's the last journal entry that travis waldron recorded?
QueryBody: select * from journal_entry where customer_name = "travis waldron" order by transaction_date desc limit 1

Title: Last 30 days, what are my account receivable?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table where account = 'account receivable' and transaction_date BETWEEN date( current_date, "-30 days") AND date( current_date)

Title: Who are my outstanding creditors?
QueryBody: select vendor_name, balance from vendors where balance != 0

Title: What was the most recent invoice for amy's bird sanctuary?
QueryBody: select transaction_id from master_txn_table where transaction_type = 'invoice' and customers = "amy's bird sanctuary" order by transaction_date desc limit 1

Title: What are my AR between <date> and <date>?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table where account = 'account receivable' and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: As of YTD, how many invoices for kookies by kathy were still unpaid?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "kookies by kathy" and transaction_type = 'invoice' and open_balance >0 and transaction_date BETWEEN date(current_date) AND date(current_date)

Title: How many invoices are still oustanding for customer wedding planning by whitney as of (date)?
QueryBody: select count(distinct transaction_id) from master_txn_table where customers = "wedding planning by whitney" and transaction_type = 'invoice' and AR_paid = 'unpaid'

Title: How much money have we spent on sales of product income this month?
QueryBody: select sum(debit) from master_txn_table as T1 join chart_of_accounts as T2 on T1.account = T2.account_name where account_type in ('Expense', 'Other Expense') and instr(account,"sales of product income") and strftime("%m", transaction_date)  = strftime("%m", current_date)

Title: How many rock did 55 twin lane sell last month?
QueryBody: select sum(quantity) from master_txn_table where customers = "55 twin lane" and product_service = 'X' and transaction_type in ('invoice', 'sales receipt')
